column1: Local Foods////Lots of seating. Come before 11:20 and you'll have the whole restaurant almost to yourself. Come after 11:45 and it gets pretty rustling.  Went at night on a Monday
column2: and it was quiet and great for my small group of people to relax and enjoy our meals.  Cashiers are always pleasant
column3: and the food comes out fairly quickly. The decor makes you want to rethink your living situation (I want an exact replica but in house living form).
